items.title: Computer Engineer
items.description: Hello, I'm Nicolás González. I invite you to explore my professional work in computer engineering and software development.

items.title: Fullstack Development
items.description: Throughout my career I've developed web systems using multiple programming languages including PHP, JavaScript, and Python, leveraging frameworks such as Angular, React Native, Laravel, among others.

items.title: IT Support and Infrastructure
items.description: Extensive experience in IT Support, Development, and Data Infrastructure, providing comprehensive technological solutions.
